about_the_game:
The Last Tape: Support Edition is a limited edition designed for those who wish to faithfully support The Last Tape and help it reach even greater heights. This special edition includes various benefits, such as:

  • Exclusive post-launch content.

  • Access to all chapters of The Last Tape from day one.

  • A unique, limited-edition version.

  • The opportunity to directly support the development of the project.

It’s worth noting that purchasing The Last Tape: Support Edition offers a significant discount compared to buying each chapter individually.

If you're ready to uncover the truth... don't be afraid.
